name: It couldn't get worse right?
description:
Hello everyone!

Here are some technical stuff for the ones who might want to know:

A total of 13 levels by now!

for the most part, every enemy has 10 hp,

your projectiles deal 1 dmg each one

Teleport cooldown: 1,5 seconds

shield cooldown: 2 seconds

double jump cooldown: 0 seconds
